title: FS: McGraw, Stark, Titus, and Willis
author: Lobo Aullando

posts.post_title: FS: McGraw, Stark, Titus, and Willis
posts.post_content:
All are sold.

That's two HOFers, an SLer, and Titus.

To get a higher resolution image (from the Edge browser), right click on the image and hit "Open image in new tab." That'll take you to the hosted image, and you can either magnify or download.

John McGraw Sweet Caporal 350-460/42 PSA 2 – sold
Dolly Stark Piedmont 350 PSA 2.5 – sold
John Titus Sweet Caporal 350/30 PSA 2 - sold
Vic Willis Piedmont 350 PSA 4 – sold

Shipping is included. Let me know if you have any questions.
Last call before I post elsewhere.
